original_text: Lord, teach us what is right, but do it carefully. Please do not punish us in your anger. That would be the end of us. Lord, teach us what is right, but do it carefully. Please do not punish us in your anger. That would be the end of us. Lord, teach us what is right, but do it carefully. Please do not punish us in your anger. That would be the end of us. Lord, teach us what is right,
korean_text: 여호와여 나를 징계하옵시되 너그러이 하시고 진노로 하지 마옵소서 주께서 내가 없어지게 하실까 두려워하나이다

sentences.original_text: Lord, teach us what is right
sentences.korean_translation: 주님, 우리에게 옳은 것을 가르쳐 주소서

sentences.original_text: Please do not punish us in your anger
sentences.korean_translation: 부디 진노 중에 우리를 벌하지 마소서

sentences.original_text: That would be the end of us
